subject: Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
Gambling
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. will investigate its officiating crew after allegations by Tim Donaghy, who was sentenced to a 15-month prison term for conspiring with gamblers.
snippet: The N.B.A. will investigate its officiating crew after allegations by Tim Donaghy, who was sentenced to a 15-month prison term for conspiring with gamblers.
